nodes.text: The Wastes were a Wild Space sector located beyond Bescane and restricted by the Galactic Empire. The worlds in the sector were used by Imperials for testing siege techniques, planetary bombardment, radiation warfare, bioweapon testing, and other prohibited actions. The planet Zeta Zero Nine was hidden in the Wastes, as was Grand Moff Bertroff Hissa's homeworld, PL-40112-CE-021105.
